main.name: Hunter Danielson
main.description: I am a constant learner, and builder. Two of the thing I enjoy the most about programming is being able to create cool things such as games or visually pleasing pieces, and being able to solve problems.
main.bio: I enjoy learning new technologies and working with ones such as React, Python, and many others. Working on a team or individually is fine with me. In my free time I enjoy playing games with friends, and spending time outside in the elements.
main.contactmessage: Please don't hesistate to get into contact with me!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Accredited university where I learned how to code, as well as become a balanced individual and contributer to society. Some courses taken include: assembly language, computer architechture, operating systems, software development, software engineering.

800+ hour intensive MERN-stack (MongoDB, Express, React & Redux, Node) professional training focused on clean code, team-building, individual problem solving, and TDD (Test Driven Development). A 3 part program; a deep dive into vanilla JavaScript, SPA app development and RESTful APIs, and Full-stack React apps with MongoDB + Mongoose.
